subject: p17770657
Impression: AP chest compared to : ET tube and nasogastric tube are in standard placements. Midline drain ends at the level of the sternal notch. Right jugular line tip in the mid SVC. New paramedian drains could be superficial. Moderate right pleural effusion has increased, and left lower lobe atelectasis is worsened. Cardiomediastinal silhouette is essentially normal. No pneumothorax.
